elements.name: bondTypeCode
elements.description:
An indication of the type of bond coverage required for the payment of duties, fees, and taxes, when required.

  • A continuous (multiple transaction) bond.
    • .
  • A single transaction bond (STB).
    • .

elements.name: bondDesignationTypeCode
elements.description:
An indication as to the general purpose of the bond.

  • The basic bond; the bond that secures the Entry and Entry Summary requirements.
    • .
  • An additional bond; the bond that secures an AD/CVD, PGA or any other aspect not covered by the basic bond requirement.
    • .
  • Substitution single transaction bond; this bond is a substitute for the bond presented at time of entry.
    • .
  • Superseding single transaction bond; this bond supersedes the bond presented at time of entry.
    • .

options.B: The basic bond; the bond that secures the Entry and Entry Summary requirements.
options.A: An additional bond; the bond that secures an AD/CVD, PGA or any other aspect not covered by the basic bond requirement.
options.U: Substitution single transaction bond; this bond is a substitute for the bond presented at time of entry.
options.E: Superseding single transaction bond; this bond supersedes the bond presented at time of entry.

elements.name: suretyCompanyCode
elements.description: Identification of the Surety company that has underwritten the bond.
